sentences.en: Although it is tasty, crab is very filling.
sentences.cn: 螃蟹虽然好吃，却容易让人感到饱足。

sentences.en: April 15 is the deadline for filling individual income - tax returns.
sentences.cn: 个人所得税申报归档的最后期限是4月15日.

sentences.en: Following the heavy rain, the storage tanks were filling up again.
sentences.cn: 那场暴雨过后, 储水池又满了.

sentences.en: His car drew up before the oil - filling station.
sentences.cn: 他把车停在加油站前面.

sentences.en: I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room. It was already midday.
sentences.cn: 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂, 原来已是中午了.

sentences.en: I have a filling in the tooth.
It makes a superb filling for cakes and sponges.
sentences.cn: 它非常适合做蛋糕和软布丁的馅儿。

sentences.en: Lake Erie is filling with the heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 由于大雨,伊利湖水正在上涨.

sentences.en: She wrote away all day, filling page after page.
sentences.cn: 她写了一页又一页, 整整写了一天.

sentences.en: Spread some of the filling over each pancake.
sentences.cn: 在每个薄煎饼上摊上一些馅。

sentences.en: The dentist said she would do the filling straightaway.
The food is filling and wholesome.
sentences.cn: 这种食物既能充饥又有营养。

sentences.en: The longer your child can go without needing a filling, the better.
sentences.cn: 孩子越晚需要补牙就越好。

sentences.en: The two girls were employed for filling envelopes.
We stopped at the filling station because we needed gasoline.
sentences.cn: 我们在加油站停下来,因我们需要加油.

words.tran_cn: （杂志等的）补白；装填者；装填物；充填器
装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职

phrases.tran_cn: 填充系数；线圈间隙因数
n. 充装系数，充填率；注入率；充灌率
允盈量，充盈量；装粉体积

trans.tran_en: a small amount of metal that is put into your tooth to cover a hole
